languages.text: "Боюсь, это не просто приветственный жест, Лорд-капитан. Кто-то посмел атаковать столицу, и слава Золоту Трона, Даргонусу хватило сил, чтобы отбиться. Вам следует немедленно разобраться в ситуации, пока вести о возможном ослаблении протектората фон Валанциус не разлетелись по Простору".

"I fear this is not a simple gesture of welcome, Lord Captain. Someone had the temerity to attack the capital, and — Golden Throne be praised — Dargonus had the strength to fend them off. You must get to the bottom of the situation quickly, before word of the von Valancius protectorate's potential weakness spreads all over the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, это не просто приветственный жест, Лорд-капитан. Кто-то посмел атаковать столицу, и слава Золоту Трона, Даргонусу хватило сил, чтобы отбиться. languages.text: “我担心这并不仅仅是在迎接我们，舰长大人。竟然有人胆敢袭击我们的首都。幸亏有黄金王座庇佑，达戈努斯成功地击退了那些入侵者。您必须迅速弄清楚这里发生了什么事情，否则恐怕整个科罗努斯扩区的人都要听说这个消息了——冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的防御可能存在弱点。”
languages.original_text: "I fear this is not a simple gesture of welcome, Lord Captain. Someone had the temerity to attack the capital, and — Golden Throne be praised — Dargonus had the strength to fend them off. You must get to the bottom of the situation quickly, before word of the von Valancius protectorate's potential weakness spreads all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “我担心这并不仅仅是在迎接我们，舰长大人。竟然有人胆敢袭击我们的首都。幸亏有黄金王座庇佑，达戈努斯成功地击退了那些入侵者。您必须迅速弄清楚这里发生了什么事情，否则恐怕整个科罗努斯扩区的人都要听说这个消息了——冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的防御可能存在弱点。”
traits.speaker: SeneschalCompanion

languages.text: «Me temo que esto no es una simple bienvenida, Lord Capitán. Alguien ha tenido la temeridad de atacar el mundo capital y, alabado sea el Trono Dorado, Dargonus pudo rechazar el ataque. Es vital que llegue al fondo de todo esto antes de que se corra la voz de la posible debilidad del protectorado von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "I fear this is not a simple gesture of welcome, Lord Captain. Someone had the temerity to attack the capital, and — Golden Throne be praised — Dargonus had the strength to fend them off. You must get to the bottom of the situation quickly, before word of the von Valancius protectorate's potential weakness spreads all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que esto no es una simple bienvenida, Lord Capitán. Alguien ha tenido la temeridad de atacar el mundo capital y, alabado sea el Trono Dorado, Dargonus pudo rechazar el ataque. Es vital que llegue al fondo de todo esto antes de que se corra la voz de la posible debilidad del protectorado von Valancius».
traits.speaker: SeneschalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, dies ist keine einfache Geste der Begrüßung, Lord Captain. Jemand hatte die Frechheit, die Hauptstadt anzugreifen, und – der Goldene Thron sei gepriesen – Dargonus hatte die Kraft, sie abzuwehren. Ihr müsst der Sache schnell auf den Grund gehen, bevor sich die Nachricht von der möglichen Schwäche des Protektorats derer von Valancius in der ganzen Ausdehnung verbreitet."
languages.original_text: "I fear this is not a simple gesture of welcome, Lord Captain. Someone had the temerity to attack the capital, and — Golden Throne be praised — Dargonus had the strength to fend them off. You must get to the bottom of the situation quickly, before word of the von Valancius protectorate's potential weakness spreads all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "I fear this is not a simple gesture of welcome, Lord Captain. You must get to the bottom of the situation quickly, before word of the von Valancius protectorate's potential weakness spreads all over the Expanse."
traits.speaker: SeneschalCompanion

languages.text: « Je crains qu'il ne s'agisse pas uniquement d'un simple geste de bienvenue, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Quelqu'un a eu l'audace d'attaquer la capitale. Heureusement, le Trône d'Or soit loué, Dargonus a eu la force de repousser les assaillants. Vous devez éclaircir rapidement cette affaire avant que la rumeur d'une possible vulnérabilité du protectorat von Valancius se répande dans les Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "I fear this is not a simple gesture of welcome, Lord Captain. Someone had the temerity to attack the capital, and — Golden Throne be praised — Dargonus had the strength to fend them off. You must get to the bottom of the situation quickly, before word of the von Valancius protectorate's potential weakness spreads all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains qu'il ne s'agisse pas uniquement d'un simple geste de bienvenue, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Quelqu'un a eu l'audace d'attaquer la capitale. Vous devez éclaircir rapidement cette affaire avant que la rumeur d'une possible vulnérabilité du protectorat von Valancius se répande dans les Étendues. »
traits.speaker: SeneschalCompanion

languages.text: 「見たまま本当に歓迎する素ぶりなのか怪しいですよ、ロード・キャプテン。首都惑星を襲う不届き者がいたのです。でも…黄金の玉座のお陰で…ダルゴナスは奴らを撃退する力があった。すぐに状況の真相を突き止めなければなりません。フォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領に、隙をつける可能性があるという情報がエクスパンス全体に広まる前に」
languages.original_text: "I fear this is not a simple gesture of welcome, Lord Captain. Someone had the temerity to attack the capital, and — Golden Throne be praised — Dargonus had the strength to fend them off. You must get to the bottom of the situation quickly, before word of the von Valancius protectorate's potential weakness spreads all over the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「見たまま本当に歓迎する素ぶりなのか怪しいですよ、ロード・キャプテン。首都惑星を襲う不届き者がいたのです。でも…黄金の玉座のお陰で…ダルゴナスは奴らを撃退する力があった。すぐに状況の真相を突き止めなければなりません。フォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領に、隙をつける可能性があるという情報がエクスパンス全体に広まる前に」
traits.speaker: SeneschalCompanion

languages.text: "Korkarım bu sıradan bir hoş geldiniz selamlaması değil Lord Kaptan. Birileri başkente saldırma cüreti göstermiş ve Altın Taht'a şükürler olsun ki Dargonus, onları geri püskürtecek güce sahipmiş. Von Valancius protektorasının potansiyel zayıflığına dair söylentiler tüm Englinlik'e yayılmadan neler olup bittiğini öğrenmeniz gerek."
languages.original_text: "I fear this is not a simple gesture of welcome, Lord Captain. Someone had the temerity to attack the capital, and — Golden Throne be praised — Dargonus had the strength to fend them off. You must get to the bottom of the situation quickly, before word of the von Valancius protectorate's potential weakness spreads all over the Expanse."
